attributes.action: continue to allow cyclists to choose whether or not to use cycle lanes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cycle lanes are often dangerous for use by quicker cyclists due to their poor condition, layout or pedestrian infringement. To enable safe use of bikes in the UK for sport, recreation and commuting it is essential to resist pressure from car drivers with extreme anti-cycling views to ban cycles from the roads.
